abstract: The socialist from Vermont is not a threat to American democracy. The president is.
lead_paragraph: Bernie Sanders is surging. What has changed? It cannot be the candidate, because, rightly or wrongly, voters perceive Mr. Sanders as always being his same sincere, authentic self. One thought is that, given how the Democratic field has narrowed, he might in the end be the man to beat President Trump, since he appeals to many of the angry citizens who proved decisive in 2016 â€” an anti-establishment message vigorously pushed by the Sanders campaign itself.
